"Cristobal": "Your final objective will be to defeat a Dread Enemy in Western Kvaris."
"\"Another Dread Enemy?\" Don't give me that. Yes, another Dread Enemy."
"We've confirmed that each area has different types of Dread Enemy."
"By facing off against different challenging opponents, you become more experienced overall."
"After this one, you'll have to defeat one in Central Kvaris, and then finally one Northern Kvaris."
"After you've defeated a Dread Enemy in every area, you'll have passed this training regimen."
"I do wonder how far you'll be able to go."
"Now go and show me that your previous victory wasn't just a fluke."
